Container.Name: TAK-Server-InstallTAK
Container.Overview:
TAK Server 5.4 using InstallTAK Script for Unraid
**PROVEN COMMUNITY SOLUTION:** 1. Download TAK Server 5.4 ZIP from https://tak.gov/products/tak-server 2. Place takserver-docker-*.zip in /mnt/user/appdata/tak-server 3. Start container - InstallTAK handles everything automatically 4. Access TAK Server at https://YOUR-IP:8443
**FEATURES:** ✓ Uses proven InstallTAK script (42+ GitHub stars) ✓ Tested and validated by TAK community ✓ Automatic PostgreSQL setup and configuration ✓ Professional certificate generation ✓ Built-in setup wizard ✓ One-command installation process
**ADVANTAGES:** ✓ Community maintained and supported ✓ Much simpler than custom solutions ✓ Proven reliability in production ✓ Official installation method adapted for containers ✓ No complex custom scripts to maintain
Container.PostArgs: bash -c "apt-get update && apt-get install -y git wget curl && git clone https://github.com/Zeroradiance/tak-server-unraid.git /tmp/setup && chmod +x /tmp/setup/scripts/setup-installtak.sh && exec /tmp/setup/scripts/setup-installtak.sh"
Container.Description: TAK Server 5.4 using proven InstallTAK script for automated setup
